data.name: Awesomenauts - Genji the Grey Skin
data.detailed_description:
Genji the Grey wizard is not some conjurer of cheap tricks. He's a trusty companion for any questing party in need of his wisdom or his crafty smoke rings!
Are you in need of some some fireballs, wisdom and balrog smiting? Look no further than Genji the Grey!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Genji the Pollen Prophet in Awesomenauts. You need to have Genji the Pollen Prophet available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.

data.short_description: Genji the Grey wizard is not some conjurer of cheap tricks. He's a trusty companion for any questing party in need of his wisdom or his crafty smoke rings! Are you in need of some some fireballs, wisdom and balrog smiting? Look no further than Genji the Grey! This DLC contains a custom skin for Genji the Pollen Prophet in Awesomenauts.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
